4. √k11 = √1155 ≈ 33.98 (close to 34!)
5. √k13 = √5765 ≈ 75.93 (close to k7=76!)
6. √k14 = √10544 ≈ 102.68

- Why is √k13 ≈ k7? Because k13 = k7² - 11!
- Is √k14 ≈ some_key? 102.68... 
- If k15 = k8² - C, what C makes it in range [16384, 32767]?
  224² = 50176, so C = 50176 - k15

Find square patterns for k14, k15, k16.
